content:
Hi Dataverse Community,
Here are Open Calls that might interest Dataverse team or* installations for funding Open Science projects as not limited to EU and the scope quite broad : https://oscars-project.eu/open-calls.
The recording of the webinar presenting the criterion for project is here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aBg14R2S83s , and examples of projects can be found here: https://oscars-project.eu/open-science-projects.
